channel.title: Proxmox on credibleDEV
channel.description: Recent content in Proxmox on credibleDEV

item.title: How to Install Synology NAS on Proxmox
item.description: This guide will walk you through setting up a Synology NAS on your Proxmox server at home.

item.title: Import VirtualBox and Virt Manager VMs to Proxmox
item.description: This guide explains how to import existing VirtualBox and Virt Manager VM's into Proxmox without any data loss.

item.title: Install Docker and Portainer on Proxmox
item.description: Learn how to install Docker on Proxmox and use Portainer to easily manager your Docker instance and containers.

item.title: Setup XRDP on a Fedora VM for Remote Desktop
item.description: This guide walks you through how to set up XRDP on Fedora 37 and use Remmina for the remote desktop connection from Linux.

item.title: Quickly Set Up a Windows Domain Controller on Proxmox - 2022 Guide
item.description: This guide explains how to quickly set up a Windows Domain Controller on Proxmox as a virtual server and join a VM to the domain.
